properties.title: Rollpark Lorraine
properties.abstract: The asphalt pump track on the property of the Lorraine school is suitable for various types of sports. Everybody can choose their own path in this landscape of rollers and depressions.
properties.description:
From mountain bikes and BMX to skateboards, the kids move through the park on the property of the Lorraine school with all sorts of transportation and in any weather â€“ even in winter.

No specific track is outlined on the asphalt landscape of rollers and depressions. Everyone can choose their own path. This improves the technique and it also teaches awareness and respect. 

The combination of easy jumps and turns makes pump tracks user-friendly for everyone, offering new challenges every time.


Surface: asphalt
